availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph L. Rowland (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from September 25, 1863 to. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Assistant Surgeon from.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 160.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 438.
